subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Harold Levitt, known as Bunny, sank 499 consecutive free throws in a basketball contest and traveled with the Harlem Globetrotters demonstrating his shooting prowess.
snippet: Harold Levitt, known as Bunny, sank 499 consecutive free throws in a basketball contest and traveled with the Harlem Globetrotters demonstrating his shooting prowess.
